text:
Umbel | Austin, TX USA | Onsite, full time

Umbel (https://www.umbel.com/) specializes in helping some of the most recognizable names in sports, media, entertainment, and the nonprofit sector aggregate customer data, gather insights and drive revenue. We are currently hiring two Software Engineer positions to join us at our office in Austin, TX; Check out our careers page at https://www.umbel.com/about/careers/ for more information!

Tech stack involves Python/Django, AWS, React, Cassandra, MySQL, and more.
